document.full_text: roger federer was gifted a spot in the semi-finals of the sony ericsson open, where he could face rival rafa nadal, after france's gilles simon retired with a stiff neck six minutes into their match on thursday.
document.title: federer moves into semis after simon retires
lines_and_colors: roger federer was gifted a spot in the semi-finals of the sony ericsson open, where he could face rival rafa nadal, after france's gilles simon retired with a stiff neck six minutes into their match on thursday.
